name: Trijam55
description:
My 3 hour Trijam #55, my first ever game jam!

Game was developed in the 3 hours assigned!
There was no pre-planing or gathering of resources, was all done during the coding phase. Thank you goodle and random free reqources sites.

There is a working global internet highscore list!

Enjoy!

Ganked resources from, THANKS!

SoundFX
https://opengameart.org/content/misc-sfx-pack

Ambient sound
https://opengameart.org/content/ambient-water-drips
https://opengameart.org/content/space-graveyard-ambient-track

Fist
https://opengameart.org/content/wesnoth-attack-icons

slap sound
http://freesound.org/people/CGEffex/sounds/98341/
